post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Rate: $46 per hour
Duration: 6 months to begin, this is a long term contract


The successful candidate will be responsible for overall technical leadership of medium to large scale projects.
~ Working with project managers, architects business analysts to complete and document technical analysis and design.
~ Ensuring that solutions adhere to development best practices and Architectural principles and meets business requirements.
~ Provide detailed development estimates to Project Manager for web development effort as well as weekly status reporting & budget forecasting
~ Familiarity with the principles of SDLC and ability to come up to speed with SDLC methodology.
~ Apply analytical skills to resolve problems and deliver viable solutions. Anticipate obstacles and execute proactive approaches to issues.
~ Configuration Management for the sub projects within the release
~ Responsible for coding, packaging, deployment and support of builds as code is promoted from Development, System, Acceptance & Production environments
~ Providing leadership, including code and unit test reviews, to a team of 3-6 developers.
~ Working closely with environment team to ensure that environments are fully functional and that builds are properly deployed
~ Support to Business and testing team
~ Defect triage and resolution
~ Data set up and environment shake down
~ Documentation of design options & solutions
~ Working with 3rd party Vendors to ensure project success


QUALIFICATOINS:
~ 5+ years of working experience with JAVA, JSP, Websphere, and web services is an absolute must.
~ Prior experience of leadership in code review and design is required
~ Previous experience with Object Grid & IBM's CMOD platform is a definite plus
~ Excellent communication skills with an ability to translate highly technical concepts to our Business partners
~ First preference is for this candidate to be based out of our Creekside location however for the right candidate - we will also accept them being located at our London, ON office.
~ Proven track record with code deployments
~ Experienced in the use of SDLC methodologies
~ Ability to work effectively with others; self motivated & a team player



***Please note: while this contract is initially listed for a 6 month duration - it is very likely that the business need will continue through July '10, 2010.



JAVA * 5+ Yrs.
JSP (Java Server Page) * 5+ Yrs.
Leadership * 5+ Yrs.
SDLC (System Development Life Cycle) * 5+ Yrs.
WebSphere * 5+ Yrs.




If you know of someone who would be interested in this role, feel free to forward the job description and my contact information

Best Regards,


Arshiya Gopalani
Recruitment Consultant
+ arshiya@nexstaf.com
i www.nexstaf.com
post.title: Java Developer
